text: Maa goe gaa gahi go tangada gi hanaga gi tagamiami haga hai lodo, noho i di gowaa dela i mugi lala loo, gei tangada dela ne gahi goe ga helekai adu boloo, ‘Dogu ihoo hagaaloho, hanaga laa nei gi di gowaa e humalia.’ Ma gaa hai beenei, le e hai goe gi hagalabagau i mua o ehoo ala ne gahi aga dalia goe.
